emailjson.content: A Group Health Insurance Policy has been issued at Bangalore, by United India Insurance Company Limited to the Policyholder.

emailjson.subject: The maximum displayed length of the email from line
emailjson.content: In last week’s article, we hoped to convince you that the from line is at least as important as the subject line in all your email communications. Now, to help you out, we tested different platforms and came up with the following “cheat-sheet”, detailing the maximum displayed length of the from line on different browsers, phones and desktop applications!

emailjson.subject: Your Free Marketing Consultation
emailjson.content: Thank you for showing interest in ThriveHive’s Guided Marketing Platform. By taking this initial step, you are already well on your way to meeting your marketing goals AND streamlining your marketing process.

emailjson.subject: Here is Your Free eBook on Facebook Marketing
emailjson.content: This week, we are excited to introduce to you an eBook that can help you better engage your audience with social media: “How to Make Facebook Work for Your Business”. The guide includes actionable insights from real small business owners from across a variety of industries.

emailjson.subject: Following up on my call
emailjson.content: called you late last week in response to your recent download of the ThriveHive Marketing Guide. I have attached it here in case you had any difficulties accessing it.

emailjson.subject: A Big Thanks
emailjson.content: Let me take this opportunity to thank you for choosing Doe Fire Extinguishers to provide your company the finest extinguishers and servicing. We are proud of our satisfied clientele and look forward to many years of working together.

emailjson.subject: You are Invited to our Webinar on Local SEO for Small Businesses
emailjson.content: You are invited to attend our FREE Local SEO Webinar to learn how to you get more traffic to your website. This is a special webinar for our valued customers only.

emailjson.subject: Redesign Your Website for $29
emailjson.content: As a valued customer at ThriveHive, we would like to offer you an exclusive deal during the month of January. For just $29, ThriveHive will help you redesign your website to optimize lead conversion for your business.

emailjson.subject: Our Latest Offering for Your Account
emailjson.content: We are excited to introduce to you our latest enhancement of your ThriveHive account, which was based on suggestions from our valued customers.
